Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: paperwork \pa"per*work`\ (p[=a]"p[~e]r*w[^u]rk`), n. Work that involves handling or writing documents such as forms, letters, reports, sales records, etc. [WordNet 1.5]
paperwork n : work that involves handling papers: forms or letters or reports etc.
